translated: The Monastic Code of the Elders
The Great Analysis🔽The chapter on training rules
1. The training rule on walking on the road

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme
translated: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa dhammaṃ desenti pe
translated: the monks from the group of six were teaching the Teaching to someone walking on the road while they themselves were walking on a side road. …

original: “Na uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na uppathena gacchantaḥ pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
translated: “‘I will not teach the Teaching to anyone walking on the road while I’m walking on a side road, except if I’m sick,’ this is how you should train.”

original: Na uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
analyzed: na uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbo
translated: One should not teach the Teaching to someone walking on the road while one is walking on a side road, except if one is sick.

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.🔽Anāpatti—🔽asañcicca …pe…
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca uppathena gacchantaḥ pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammam deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa  anāpatti  a san cit ca pe
translated: If a monk, out of disrespect, teaches the Teaching to someone walking on the road while he is walking on a side road, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
There is no offense if he does not intend to do it; if he is the first offender; if he is insane; if he is the first offender.
